branchCategory.name: High Precision Slide Table - MXP/MXJ
branchCategory.description: <p>The high precision slide tables have parallelism of 0.005 mm or better for all its bore sizes. Its actuator body and guide block are made from Martensitic stainless steel for high rigidity and integrated to guide rails for isolating the load bearing from the movement of the piston rod and seals.</p>

branchItem.name: MXP, High Precision Slide Table (Recirculating Bearings)
branchItem.description: <p>The MXP high precision slide tables have travelling parallelism of 0.004 mm for all its bore sizes and non-rotating accuracy +/-0.03&deg; for 6, 8, 10 mm bore siszes and non-rotating accuracy +/-0.04&deg; for 12, 16 mm bore sizes. Its actuator body and guide block are made from Martensitic stainless steel for high rigidity and integrated to guide rails for isolating the load bearing from the movement of the piston rod and seals.</p>

branchItem.name: MXPJ6, Miniature High Precision Slide Table (Recirculating Bearings)
MXJ, High Precision Slide Table
branchItem.description: <p>The MXJ compact and lightweight precision slide table provides travelling parallelism of 0.005 mm in a compact package.  The actuator guide blocks are made from Martensitic stainless steel for high rigidity and integrated to guide rails for isolating the load bearing from the movement of the piston rod and seals.</p>

branchItem.name: MXJZ, Stroke Adjuster
branchItem.description: <p>For use with the MXJ 12mm and 16mm bore MXJ compact slide tables.</p>

branchItem.name: MXJZ-AD, Switch Rail Assembly
branchItem.description: <p>For use with the MXJ 12mm and 16mm bore MXJ compact slide tables.</p>
